text: Saburō Ōkita (大来 佐武郎 Ōkita Saburō) (3 November 1914 – 9 February 1993) was a Japanese economist and politician. He was the Minister of Foreign Affairs from November 1979 through July 1980. ==References== Category:1914 births Category:1993 deaths Category:Japanese economists Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Foreign ministers of Japan
title: Saburō Ōkita
